long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the dark and intense world of Eto Yoshimura with this chilling live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A haunting interface with a dark, eerie atmosphere inspired by Eto Yoshimura’s mysterious and powerful presence.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that complements Eto's enigmatic and unsettling nature.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Explore Tokyo Ghoul-inspired mini-games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Enhance your browsing experience with features as complex and intriguing as Eto Yoshimura herself.
